Uses of Interface
com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler

Packages that use HttpHandler
Package
Description
com.sun.net.httpserver
Provides a simple high-level Http server API, which can be used to build embedded HTTP servers.

  • Uses of HttpHandler in com.sun.net.httpserver

    Creates a file handler that serves files from a given directory path (and its subdirectories).

    Returns the handler for this context.

    Complements a conditional HttpHandler with another handler.
    static HttpHandler
    HttpHandlers.of(int statusCode, Headers headers, String body)
    Returns an HttpHandler that sends a response comprising the given statusCode, headers, and body.
